title: Coleslaw

items.name: medium cabbage
items.notes: about 3 pounds, outer leaves removed, quartered through the core, core removed, quarters cut crosswise in half, finely shredded

items.name: large jalapeño pepper
items.notes: cut open, seeds discarded, diced fine

items.name: small red onion
items.notes: cut in half through the stem, peeled, thinly sliced

instructions: In a very large bowl or pot, combine the prepared cabbage, jalapeño, onion, and cilantro. Toss to mix. Sprinkle with the lime juice, vinegar, oil, salt, pepper, and sugar, and toss to coat.
Let slaw sit for 1 hour, tossing occasionally. Drain; taste and adjust seasonings. Wait another hour. Serve at room temperature.
